title: QR Code Generator
shortDesc: Generate vCard and link QR codes
longDesc: A full-stack app with Flask backend and React frontend for generating custom QR codes with logos and styles.
challenge: Building real-time data visualization that could handle large datasets without performance issues.
solution: Implemented efficient data streaming with WebSockets and optimized rendering using virtual scrolling.

title: Minecraft Server Guide
longDesc: A guide hosted on GitHub Pages that walks users through setting up a modded Minecraft server with Forge and Playit.gg.
